channel.title: How to ban people:
channel.description:
I am in no way encouraging this, I just want to discuss it. I do believe it is morally wrong.
I was thinking...
If Jagex is just bullshitting about their detection system of selling gp for real cash then it wouldnt work, but anyways:
According to them, when you trade someone large amounts of money with nothing of the same value in return, then they can detect that your selling things. And according to them they check the messages that you say, so if you talk to them about buying gp and stuff, then they'll know for sure and ban you.
So, what would happen if you went up to someone and said "Here is that million gp you bought off ebay", and then traded them a million gp for free. Would they get banned? I mean there's no way in hell they are going to refuse the offer of 1 million gp even if they have no cue what your talking about. If you had an enemy you could do thisl it would cost a million gp but if your one of those autoers who make millions a day then it'd be no problem lol. Anyways, I wont be testing it. It would be interesting to test it on a mule accountt hough, and see if Jagex notices.

item.title: How to ban people:
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

Snipe:

And on the same note if you were to buy gp off a website and have the seller come up to you and be like “Hey bud heard about you dieing man, here take this, it’ll help you get back on your feet.” Then you be like, “Wow thanks man, I’ll pay you back as soon as I can.” You just got yourself covered.

A player on my private server wanted to buy stats and items for real rs cash got a mil… heh we did like i walked up and asked him to borrow some money to duel and said i’de pay it back lol. Simple as that…

Read full topic

item.description:

Hmmmmmm…there should be a better way to ban people, I will think about it (so you do not have to waste 1M each time)[br][size=1]Posted at: April 24, 2006, 07:32:29 pm[/size][hr]When you use money art you can only see the changed value right? cause if it were differnet, you could do that. Besides, I am mad at runescape for the whole essence thing. I whish there were some “item swap” technique (ya ya ya I know its impossibible)[br][size=1]Posted at: April 24, 2006, 07:34:50 pm[/size][hr]And technicly you would not need to give them the money-you could just send them a PM…

item.title: How to ban people:
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I am going to test it tonight on a mule account.

It’ll be a waste of 1 million gp, but oh well.

I’ll proxy on one account and use my normal ip on the other and delete my uid etc, and I’ll approach the account and say: “Here is that 1 million gp you bought off ebay” and I’ll trade it onto the account and see if it gets banned. If it does then I am pretty sure we have found a big flaw in their system because you could get anyone banned with this.

Read full topic

item.title: How to ban people:
item.dc:creator: @iruleatants iruleatants
item.description:
@iruleatants wrote:

true dat, see when im trading with my mule i say

“what up man”
“sup”
we trade
“thanks ill sell it to u and give back half”
“allright”
“u like minings ess”
“yeah that all i do”
“okay cya”

and i dont get banned(even though i dont give back half
